original_text: And in fact, you do love all of God’s family throughout Macedonia. Yet we urge you, brothers and sisters, to do so more and more,
korean_text: 너희가 온 마게도냐 모든 형제에 대하여 과연 이것을 행하도다 형제들아 권하노니 더욱 그렇게 행하고

sentences.original_text: And in fact, you do love
Yet we urge you, brothers and sisters
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리는 당신들을 권면합니다, 형제 자매들이여

sentences.original_text: to do so more and more
